title: 3/bd, Separate dining area, Located in Henderson
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!
Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball
Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher
Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit

Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity
